home-loads.name: Home page loads
home-loads.description: Home page renders with main heading visible

home-to-blog.name: Navigate from home to blog detail
home-to-blog.description: User clicks 'Read blogs' on home page and navigates to a blog detail

home-to-catalog.name: Navigate from home to catalog/product
home-to-catalog.description: User clicks 'Shop now' on home page and navigates to catalog then product detail

home-product-carousel.name: Navigate through product carousel
home-product-carousel.description: User clicks a product from the home page carousel and reaches the detail page

auth-sign-in-form.name: Sign-in form display and interaction
auth-sign-in-form.description: User navigates to sign-in page, sees form fields and can type in them

auth-login-invalid.name: Login with invalid credentials
auth-login-invalid.description: User submits invalid credentials and stays on sign-in page

auth-protected-redirect.name: Protected route redirect
auth-protected-redirect.description: Unauthenticated user accessing /dashboard or /backoffice is redirected to sign-in

blog-list-view.name: View blog listing
blog-list-view.description: User views the /blogs page and sees blog cards

blog-detail-view.name: View blog detail
blog-detail-view.description: User clicks a blog card and views the detail page with matching title

blog-detail-back.name: Navigate back from blog detail
blog-detail-back.description: User uses browser back from blog detail and returns to blogs list

navigation-between-pages.name: Navigate between main sections
navigation-between-pages.description: User navigates across home, catalog, blogs, checkout, and sign-in pages

navigation-header.name: Working header navigation
navigation-header.description: Header/nav element exists and contains navigation links

navigation-footer.name: Working footer
navigation-footer.description: Footer element is visible on the home page

catalog-browse.name: Browse product catalog
catalog-browse.description: User visits /catalog and sees product cards

catalog-product-detail.name: View product detail
catalog-product-detail.description: User navigates to a product detail page and sees title and price

catalog-product-gallery.name: Product gallery images
catalog-product-gallery.description: Product detail page displays at least one image

catalog-back-navigation.name: Navigate back to catalog
catalog-back-navigation.description: User uses browser back from product detail and returns to /catalog

cart-add.name: Add product to cart
cart-add.description: User adds a product from detail page to cart; cart is not empty on checkout

cart-empty.name: Empty cart state
cart-empty.description: Checkout page shows 'Your cart is empty' when no items are in cart

cart-update-qty.name: Update product quantity in cart
cart-update-qty.description: User updates the quantity input for a cart item

cart-remove.name: Remove product from cart
cart-remove.description: User removes a product from cart and sees empty cart message

cart-subtotal.name: Cart subtotal calculation
cart-subtotal.description: Checkout page shows a visible Subtotal label when cart has items

cart-persist.name: Cart persists across page reloads
cart-persist.description: Cart items survive a full page reload

cart-multiple-products.name: Add multiple different products
cart-multiple-products.description: User adds two different products; both appear in checkout cart

checkout-form-display.name: Checkout form display
checkout-form-display.description: Checkout page renders with form fields visible

checkout-form-validation.name: Checkout form required field validation
checkout-form-validation.description: Submit button is disabled when checkout form is empty

checkout-form-fill.name: Accept valid checkout data
checkout-form-fill.description: User fills all checkout form fields with valid data

purchase-complete-flow.name: Complete full purchase flow
purchase-complete-flow.description: End-to-end: home → catalog → product detail → add to cart → checkout → fill form → submit enabled

purchase-multiple-items.name: Checkout with multiple cart items
purchase-multiple-items.description: User adds two products and both appear in checkout with subtotal visible

purchase-disabled-empty-cart.name: Checkout disabled when cart is empty
purchase-disabled-empty-cart.description: Even with form filled, checkout button is disabled when cart is empty

purchase-loading-state.name: Loading state during form submission
purchase-loading-state.description: Submit button triggers loading/navigation state after click

auth-sign-up-form.name: Sign-up form display and validation
auth-sign-up-form.description: User navigates to /sign-up and sees registration form with client-side validation

auth-forgot-password-form.name: Forgot password form display
auth-forgot-password-form.description: User navigates to /forgot-password and sees email input and send code button
